Description: Serpentine(?) male figure wearing a short wig; back-pillar; scratched Hieroglyphic text round the plinth.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2005-2006 Oct-Feb, Houston Museum of Natural Sciences, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006 7 Mar-6 Aug, Mobile (Alabama), Gulf Coast Exploreum Science Center, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story 2009 Apr-present, Swaffham Museum, Egyptian Gallery, LT Loan
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
